## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                    | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |

| `name`   | `name`    | The name of the checkout attribute to populate | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    |                                                | `number` | `undefined` |
